channel.title: Dude about server connection
channel.description:
Well, i'm new in this, i wanna know about the following:
I use hamachi for my server because i got a router and i need help to portfoward it..but its another thing..
i wanna know if i can have hamachi and no-ip opened at the same time, or no-ip ip won't work , because hamachi gives me another ip. please answer it correctly. thanks.

item.title: Dude about server connection
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“arkanis, post:1, topic:236398”]Well, i’m new in this, i wanna know about the following:

I use hamachi for my server because i got a router and i need help to portfoward it…but its another thing…

i wanna know if i can have hamachi and no-ip opened at the same time, or no-ip ip won’t work , because hamachi gives me another ip. please answer it correctly. thanks.[/quote]You can use a no-ip ip with a hamachi ip…
